column1: The Pit Room////The experience was good in regards to the staff taking the order and helping with the take out experience. However
column2: the food quality was pretty poor. We ordered brisket
column3: coleslaw and potato salad. The brisket had good texture but the flavor was pretty low quality
column4: by far this was the saltiest food we have had in a long time. The theme repeated in the potato salad and the coleslaw was overly acidic. Â Definitely not on my list of places to order from in the future.
